title: Warm potato salad with shallot dressing
description: Forget gloppy mayonnaise - this German-style potato salad is tangy with shallot and white wine vinegar.Each serving provides 530kcal, 6g protein, 48g carbohydrate (of which 6g sugars), 33g fat (of which 5g saturates), 6g fibre and 0.1g salt.
ingredients: 6 new potatoes, preferably Charlotte, Ratte and truffle
30ml/1Â¼fl oz olive oil, plus extra for drizzling
1 portion summer leaves (eg, rocket, sorrel, dandelion leaf, red chard leaf)
